Class StandingsManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • fi.tamk.tiko.th_results.tournament.StandingsManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.util.Comparator<Player>

    public class StandingsManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.util.Comparator<Player>
    Class calculates points and statistics for players and sorts them in final standings order.

    1.0
